rows.label: tlk43310142_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Have you ever faced Acedian
warrior monks in combat?

rows.label: tlk43310142_04_msg0002
rows.name:
I always thought they'd be pushovers,
since they grew up in the peace-loving
land of Acedia, but apparently not?

rows.label: tlk43310142_04_msg0003
rows.name:
I dunno, the ones I've seen patrolling
the cathedral didn't strike me as very
scary-looking.

rows.label: tlk43310142_04_msg0004
rows.name:
'Course, Acedian folk are pretty lanky
in general, so you'd think their weapons
would be too heavy for them.

rows.label: tlk43310142_04_msg0005
rows.name: Are these monks even Acedian at all?

rows.label: tlk43310142_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Could they secretly be training up
refugees from Invidia or Gula,
or even Superbia?
